text: I ve worn my support system thin Family was never something that much soothed me to begin with  but my friends  hobbies  leisure both active and passive  and even my pets have done nothing but wear me down for the past few weeks  I imagine the feeling is becoming mutual at this point I sorta saw this coming in advance  It was a slow descent over the past two years  and I clued in on it half way through  I ve never been  sunny  per se  considering I have a few attempts under my belt already  but I haven t fallen this hard in my life  Since I m short all of the tools I d normally fall back on  I ve degraded to my old  autistic and frenzied childhood self  reclusive  cruel  fit throwing and self mutilating  Turns out the little retard who stimmed by beating his head against objects  who sabotaged himself at every corner  who  starved  himself in disgust at the person he was  would end up being pretty fucked up  And he s alive and well at the helm of my brain Acting like this  as a grown adult is disgusting in shameful  I used to feel that I was better than this  but knowing that I never really got over the obstacle that is myself is just downright  crushing  My childhood nightmare  myself  came true  and I m helpless to stop it  Helpless  abandoned and  secretly  hopeful that will be the one that finally does me in And at the very least  if I never find the courage to put myself down on my own terms  my  year life expectancy will rear its sweet  rotting head soon enough

text: i think i found out why GMT  Greenwich Mean Time  is so widely used in the  th century and before it was known how to find your latitude at sea by using the stars  but longitude was always a problem  in   the British government offered a   pound prize to technology that could accurately determine one s longitudinal position at sea  in   John Harrison designed the chronometer  a portable timekeeping device  set to the time in Greenwich  England  and submitted it to the government and eventually won the prize  by carrying a chronometer reading Greenwich time with them  sailors could use their local time compared to Greenwich time to accurately determine their longitude thanks for coming to my TED talk yall
summary: John Harrison won a prize for developing a portable timekeeping device that could accurately determine one's longitudinal position at sea in GMT Greenwich Mean Time. He explains why GMT is so widely used in the th century and why longitude was always a problem for sailors.
cleaned: john harrison win prize develop portable timekeepe device accurately determine one longitudinal position sea greenwich mean time explain widely century longitude problem sailor
